mapper.select: SELECT * FROM park_member WHERE companyUuid = #{companyUUID} AND is_del =1
SELECT * FROM park_member WHERE companyUuid = #{companyUUID} AND is_del =0
SELECT * FROM park_member WHERE companyUuid = #{companyUUID} AND is_del =1 AND lpm =#{lpm}
SELECT * FROM park_member WHERE companyUuid = #{companyUUID} AND is_del =0 AND lpm =#{lpm}
